channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Lorenzo Reitano
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Lorenzo Reitano

item.title: Machine Learning: Customer Segmentation Tool
item.description: Created a K-Means algorithm that clusters customers into groups based on Age, Education, Employment Years, Income and Debt. Pre-Processed the data deleting categorical variables. Normalized the data using the Standard Scaler. Optimized the K-Means number of Clusters to 3 and number of consecutive runs in terms of inertia to 12, in order to achieve the best model. 3-D Plotted the Model Results. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Mini Tool: Machine Learning Drug Estimator
item.description: Created a Decision Tree algorithm that estimates the best Drug (accuracy score 98%) for patients given Age, Sex, Blood Pressure, Cholesterol and Sodium to Potassium Ratio. Pre-Processed the data and converted categorical values into dummy/indicator variables. Split the data with a Test Size of 0.3. Optimized the Decision Tree with an Entropy criterion and a Max Depth of 4 to obtain the best model. Plotted the Model Results. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Contact
item.description: Follow me on LinkedIn and GitHub. Platform URL LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/lorenzo-reitano-9b1a33108/ GitHub: https://github.com/Relor91 This is an example of a custom shortcode that you can put right into your content. You will need to add a form action to the the shortcode to make it work. Check out Formspree for a simple, free form service. Your Name Email Address An email address is required.
